  • 配置postfix gmail smpt

    Migarated from here at ‘2016-07-08 18:28:43’. 参照:https://rtcamp.com/tutorials/linux/ubuntu-postfix-gmail-smtp/ 安装postfix, mailutils    sudo apt-get install postfix mailutils       mailutils依赖libmailutils, libmailutils又依赖libsqlclient, 一个一个装上。 配置postfix    sudo vim /etc/postfix/main.fc:       relayhost = [smtp.gmail.com]:587 smtp_sasl_auth_enable = yes       smtp_sasl_password_maps = hash:/etc/postfix/sasl_passwd       smtp_sasl_security_options = noanonymous smtp_tls_CAfile = /etc/postfix/cacert.pem smtp_use_tls = yes 配置gmail帐号文件   vim /etc/postfix/sasl_passwd:        [smtp.gmail.com]:587...

  • .emacs配置

    Migarated from here at ‘2016-07-08 18:28:43’. 环境：ubuntu12.04, emacs23 最大化窗口： (custom-set-variables  ’(initial-frame-alist (quote ((fullscreen . maximized))))) 背景色，前景色，焦点色： (add-to-list ‘default-frame-alist ‘(foreground-color . “white”)) (add-to-list ‘default-frame-alist ‘(background-color . “black”)) (add-to-list ‘default-frame-alist ‘(cursor-color . “coral”)) 访问系统剪贴板快捷键绑定： (global-set-key [(control shift X)] ‘clipboard-kill-region) (global-set-key [(control shift C)] ‘clipboard-kill-ring-save) (global-set-key [(control shift Y)] ‘clipboard-yank) load gtags-mode:    ...

  • 不用加载secbulk.ko的linux dnw2

    Migarated from here at ‘2016-07-08 18:28:43’. 感谢 http://www.arm9home.net/read.php?tid-1502.html， 提供了这么好的资源。 开发环境：ubuntu12.04，开发板：FriendlyARM mini2440 dnw2下载路径：http://c8051f320dev.googlecode.com/files/dnw2_linux_latest.tgz 直接解压编译: tar xzvf dnw2_linux_latest.tgz cd dnw2 make -lusb dnw2.c -o dnw2 【注】编译时需要libusb库: sudo apt-get install libusb-dev 使用方法： ./dnw2 速度很快，百发百中！

  • TL-WN821N usb wifi 移植

  • 清空linux指令缓存

    Migarated from here at ‘2016-07-08 18:28:43’. 每个用户的home目录下都有一个.bash_history的隐藏文件，清空它： cat /dev/null > .bash_history; 重新登录后按上下键就不会再出现以前用过的指令了。

    May 15, 2013
    in Old blogs
